content.text:
I'll perform a quick warmup by exploring the repository structure.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Glob">
<parameter name="pattern">**/*.md</parameter>
<parameter name="limit">20</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
["CHANGELOG.md", "CLAUDE.md", "README.md", ".claude/agents/Architect.md", ".claude/agents/ClaudeResearcher.md", ".claude/agents/Engineer.md", ".claude/agents/GeminiResearcher.md", ".claude/agents/Pentester.md", ".claude/agents/PerplexityResearcher.md", ".claude/agents/Researcher.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/AnnotatedScreenshots.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Aphorisms.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Comics.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Comparisons.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Frameworks.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Maps.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Mermaid.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/RecipeCards.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Stats.md", ".claude/skills/Art/workflows/Taxonomies.md"]
</result>

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Read">
<parameter name="file_path">/home/jenkins/Personal_AI_Infrastructure/README.md</parameter>
<parameter name="limit">100</parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>
<result>
# Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI)

A powerful AI-native productivity system designed to enhance your workflow with intelligent assistance, structured memory, and seamless integration across tools.

## Overview

Personal AI Infrastructure provides a comprehensive framework for:
- **Intelligent Memory**: Persistent context and conversation history
- **Structured Workflows**: Customizable patterns for common tasks
- **Multi-AI Integration**: Works with Claude, GPT, Gemini, and more
- **Personal Knowledge Base**: Your own AI-enhanced documentation

## Quick Start

### Installation

```bash
# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/Personal_AI_Infrastructure.git

# Run the installation script
./install.sh
```

### Configuration

1. Copy the example configuration:
   ```bash
   cp config.example.json config.json
   ```

2. Edit `config.json` with your preferences and API keys

3. Initialize your personal workspace:
   ```bash
   ./scripts/init-workspace.sh
   ```

## Features

### Memory System
- Automatic conversation summarization
- Cross-session context preservation
- Intelligent retrieval and recall

### Workflow Automation
- Pre-built templates for common tasks
- Custom workflow creation
- Integration with external tools

### Knowledge Management
- Personal documentation system
- AI-assisted note-taking
- Smart search and retrieval

## Documentation

- [Installation Guide](docs/installation.md)
- [Configuration Reference](docs/configuration.md)
- [Workflow Guide](docs/workflows.md)
- [API Documentation](docs/api.md)

## Project Structure

```
Personal_AI_Infrastructure/
├── .claude/           # Claude-specific configurations
│   ├── agents/        # Agent definitions
│   ├── skills/        # Skill workflows
│   └── memory/        # Memory storage
├── scripts/           # Utility scripts
├── docs/              # Documentation
└── config.json        # Main configuration
```

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Please read our contributing guidelines before submitting PRs.

## License

MIT License - see LICENSE file for details.

</result>

Warmup complete. I've explored the repository structure and understand this is a **Personal AI Infrastructure (PAI)** project - a comprehensive AI-native productivity system with:

- **Agent definitions** in `.claude/agents/` (Architect, Engineer, Researcher variants, Pentester)
- **Skill workflows** in `.claude/skills/Art/workflows/` (various visualization and documentation workflows)
- **Memory and configuration systems**

The repository is on the `main` branch with several modified agent and workflow files pending commit. Ready to assist with any planning or architecture tasks.
